# Table
```import { Table } from "@elevenia/master-ui/Components/Atom";```

## Basic Table
<Preview>
  <Story id="atom-table--basic" />
</Preview>

## Table Responsive

If you need to custom css. props `responsive` provided preflix className. <br/>
just set your preflix class like `responsive={'custom'}'` that will return className `table-responsive-custom` at container div.

<Preview>
  <Story id="atom-table--responsive" />
</Preview>

## Table Rounded

You can define props `round` with value types `string` or `boolean`.<br/> 
example: `round:'10px'` or just using `round` then you got `'4px'` as a default value 

<Preview>
  <Story id="atom-table--rounded-table" />
</Preview>

## Table without Shadow
What you need is just remove the props `boxShadow`.

<Preview>
  <Story id="atom-table--without-shadow" />
</Preview>
